entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
